snippet.title: First Look: Kryxivia Team Intro & Gameplay
snippet.description:
Welcome everyone, today, the Kryxivia team plays in-game and talks while going through the City and trying to defeat a boss!

Kryxivia is a fantasy 3D MMORPG, playable on any modern browser, directly available on our website at kryxivia.io, a whole eco-system awaiting new adventurous players to collect Kryxit! In our world, prepare yourself to earn crypto-currency and unique rare NFT while having a fun and cooperative experience with your friends.

Website: https://kryxivia.io
Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/kryxivia
Join our Telegram: https://t.me/kryxivia
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/kryxivia
